title: Provided further that FSI equivalent to TDR as per Table 12 A of Regulation 32, in lieu of road widening or roads proposed under the D
clause_text: Provided further that FSI equivalent to TDR as per Table 12 A of Regulation 32, in lieu of road widening or roads proposed under the D.P. or the MMC Act, 1888 as per Regulation 16 may be allowed to be utilized over and above the permissible FSI as per column 7 of table 12, on remainder plot.
section: Floor Space Indices in Residential, Commercial and Industrial Zones
